mapper.sql: ObjectId, ParentObjectId, CreateTime, CreateBy, UpdateTime, UpdateBy, State, deleteflag, JJCS, JJCSZRR, JJCSJHWCSJ, JJCSJJWT, JJCSWCSJ, GZJD
mapper.select: select a.*,b.XM ZRRXM from I_Implementation a left join FB_User b on a.JJCSZRR = b.ObjectId where ObjectId = #{objectid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into I_Implementation (ObjectId, ParentObjectId, CreateTime, CreateBy, UpdateTime, UpdateBy, State, DeleteFlag, JJCS, JJCSZRR, JJCSJHWCSJ, JJCSJJWT, JJCSWCSJ,GZJD) values (newid(), #{parentobjectid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createby,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateby,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jjcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jjcszrr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{jjcsjhwcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jjcsjjwt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jjcswcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gzjd,jdbcType=INTEGER})

where ObjectId = #{objectid,jdbcType=CHAR}

update I_Implementation set ParentObjectId = #{parentobjectid,jdbcType=CHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CreateBy = #{createby,jdbcType=CHAR}, UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateBy = #{updateby,jdbcType=CHAR}, State = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DeleteFlag = #{deleteflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JJCS = #{jjcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JJCSZRR = #{jjcszrr,jdbcType=CHAR}, JJCSJHWCSJ = #{jjcsjhwcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JJCSJJWT = #{jjcsjjwt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JJCSWCSJ = #{jjcswcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GZJD = #{gzjd,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ObjectId = #{objectid,jdbcType=CHAR}
